subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|p}} in the oracle bone script. In the seal script, it became an {{Han compound|尾|水|ls=ic|nocap=y|t1=tail|t2=water}}. {{zh-l|*尾}} later simplified into {{zh-l|*尸|body}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[urine]] {{zh-mw|m:泡|c:篤}}
# to [[urinate]]; to [[pee]]
# {{lb|zh|dialectal Mandarin|Jin}} to [[pay attention]] to someone
# {{lb|zh|dialectal Mandarin}} to [[yield]] to; to [[give up]]; to [[admit]] [[defeat]]
# {{lb|zh|Tianjin|_|Mandarin}} to [[fear]]; to be [[afraid]] of (the other party in a fight)
# {{lb|zh|Tianjin|_|Mandarin}} to [[lose heart]]; to be [[discouraged]]; to be [[cowardly]]
# {{lb|zh|Tianjin|_|Mandarin}} [[courage]]; [[guts]]
# {{lb|zh|Ürümqi|_|Mandarin}} [[smug]]; [[cocky]]; [[pleased]] with oneself

subSections.text:

# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} [[urine]]
